adjective.description: Relating to sound or the sense of hearing.
examples: dogs have a much greater acoustic range than humans

adjective.description: (of popular music or musical instruments) not having electrical amplification.

noun.description: The properties or qualities of a room or building that determine how sound is transmitted in it.
The branch of physics concerned with the properties of sound.
A musical instrument without electrical amplification, typically a guitar.

origin: Mid 17th century: from Greek akoustikos, from akouein hear.
